title: The Story of wine: the great dessert drinks
creator_credit: Peter Batty and Peter Batty Productions
brief_description: Shows great vineyards in France, Spain, Italy and Portugal, together with the steps in the art of wine making, focusing on white wines and in particular the dessert wines.
